Index.title: Hello world!

meta.title: Gran Vellas Urbanismo - Launch of the Jericoacoara Real Estate Development
meta.description: Gran Vellas Urbanismo is pleased to announce the launch of our new real estate development, Jericoacoara. Located about 300 km from Fortaleza, Jeri is a charming fishing village and one of the most sought-after destinations for travelers.
meta.metakeyswords: Real Estate Development, Launch, Jericoacoara, Gran Vellas Urbanismo, Developer, Properties, Prime Location, Fishing Village, Beautiful Beaches, Tourist Attractions

Index.MainBanner: A piece of paradise: Invest in Jericoacoara.

FooterNotes.title: LEGAL NOTICE
FooterNotes.p: * Installments valid for lot 23 of 250.05mÂ², not including the 7 annual installments of R$ 12,502.50, both installments and balloons will be annually adjusted by IPCA+6%. (check the table and availability with your broker).
FooterNotes.ptwo: We reserve the right to change any information or value provided for the offered lots and their accessories (condominium, property tax, etc.), both on our website and in any other means of communication or promotion of offers without prior notice.
FooterNotes.ptree: We also reserve the right to only assist those customers who identify themselves with full name, landline or mobile phone, and email, and the property is exclusively for their use and interest. Customers who refuse to provide such information, unfortunately, will not be able to receive assistance, whether for sale or various questions, no matter how simple they may be; Customers who contact us requesting information for third parties must provide, in addition to their own data, the data of the third party interested in order to avoid duplicate service and communication failures.
